about.title: About us
about.text:
Science School is a scientific and creative center with innovative approaches to education.

Are you planning to study abroad?
Science English will help you prepare for exams.

We will teach you to express yourself and unlock the potential of your child!

learning.title: Education
learning.description:
Individual training program:
— Secondary school - 5th - 9th grade
— Senior school - 10th - 11th grade
— Classes will be 2 times a week

The training is adapted according to the Cambridge IGSCE and Ukrainian curricula and is aimed at preparing for the international SAT and Cambridge exams
learning.list_ending_title: Upon completion of the course, the student will receive:
